snippet: The real estate agent Kathy Martin did not realize she had an exceptional talent for running until she was in her late 40s, but she has since broken several running records.
abstract: Profile of runner Kathy Martin, real estate agent on Long Island, NY, who did not realize she had an exceptional talent for running until she was in her late 40s; at age 60, Martin continues to redefine what is possible for an older body, setting a string of formidable national and world records for her age group.
lead_paragraph: The real estate agent Kathy Martin did not realize she had an exceptional talent for running until she was in her late 40s, but she has since broken several running records.

headline.seo: Kathy Martin Started Late but She Is Catching Up
headline.main: After Late Start, Runner Is Speeding Through Records
